raw_text: COSMAS DE SARAM – Beloved son of late Chevalier J.E.M. De Saram and Mrs Marian De Saram nee Karunaratne,​ beloved husband of Mrs Chitranganie De Saram,​ loving father of Chanuka,​ Chiranka,​ Chamindra (Australia) and Chehani,​ father-in-law of Neluka,​ Shalika,​ Michelle (Australia) and Angelo,​ precious Seeya of Shanelle,​ Joshua,​ Matthew and Amelia,​ loving brother of Eileen,​ Dr Ranjith,​ Eshanthamal,​ late Damian and late Sunimal. Remains will lie at Jayaratne ‘Restpect Home’ for viewing from 8.30 a.m. on Thursday 30th November and 1st December. Cortege leaves the ‘Restpect Home’ Jayaratne 1st Dec. 23 at 3.00 p.m. for St. Joseph’s Church,​ Grandpass for final blessing followed by Burial at Madampitiya Cemetery at 4.30 p.m.078062

Dr WIJENAIKE – AMARAPALA – aged 96,​ husband of late Sri,​ father of Susie and Nishan,​ father- in-law of Jeremy and Genevieve,​ grandfather of Christianna and Nuwan,​ brother of late Noel,​ peacefully passed away on 30th November 2023 at his home. His remains will lie at Jayaratne Restpect Home on Saturday,​ 2nd December from 10.00 am onwards and Cremation at 4.00 pm at Kanatta Crematorium,​ entrance opposite Devi Balika Borella.078713

GOONETILLEKE IRA – Beloved wife of the late H.L.K. (Hugh) Goonetilleke,​ precious mother of Ruani,​ beloved sister of late Chandrasoma,​ late Amitha,​ late Jaya,​ late Wimalatissa,​ late Soma,​ Vijita,​ late Dr Mala,​ late Deema and late Chinta. Cortege leaves 2/​1,​ Greenland Avenue,​ off Anderson Road,​ Nedimala,​ Dehiwela at 4.00 p.m. on Friday,​ December 1st for Cremation at Nedimala Cemetery.078844
